page.title: 13CHURCHES
page.content: All the main Christian denominations have churches in the area. In the main street there is the Methodist Church and a church of the Church of Ireland. On the Castlefin road is the Catholic Church, St Eugene's, which was built in 1978. The church which it replaced St Patrick's, also on the Castlefin road, is now used as a hall. There is a Baptist Meeting House on the Omagh road. On the Strabane road are the Presbyterian Church, the Mission Centre and a Evangelical Church, completed this year 1985.
